title: [Discussion]What are the college timings?
content:
Is the timings for all the courses the same or is it only for btech?
My classes start from sep 22nd and 
I saw a timetable for btech it said 3 days are half days from 8-1 and 2 days full from 8-4 and saturdays are off
Is it the same for mca or is it 8-4 everyday 
Someone tell me so I can mentally prepare ðŸ˜ž

comments.body: The timetable you are telling is applicable to only b.tech courses; For mca it might differ, better to ask someone from that department.
will it be shorter or longer thats all im asking and any mca people I find barely respond
Are u Joining PESU through KCET Round 2?? or Round 3
As far as I have seen it's longer for mca people;
man but saturdays are holidays for everyone right?
How can the classes for BTech start from sep 22? It has already started today(8 sep).
im asking for MCA timings bro maybe i should edit the post ðŸ¥€
